aiVolumeRate.Wiki: Normal when 1x. When set to 0, the radius of sound becomes 0 (SE and SFX are unrelated game-like parameters).

spEffectIdOnHit0.Wiki: When the character steps on the hit material, the set special effect 0 is exhibited.

spEffectIdOnHit1.Wiki: When the character steps on the hit material, the set special effect 1 is exhibited.

floorHeightType.Wiki: For floating items such as the surface of the water

disableFallDamage.Wiki: Set to 1 for floors that are not subject to fall damage

isHardnessForSoundReverb.Wiki: Is it a hard material for sound echo? (0: soft, 1: hard)

hardnessType.Wiki: The hardness of the material. Used for soft contact processing of rigid bodies.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_2.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 0 2nd lap

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_3.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 0 3rd lap

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_4.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 0 4th lap

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_5.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 0 5th lap

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_6.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 0 6th lap

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_7.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 0 7th lap

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_8.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 0 8th lap

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_2.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1st lap

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_3.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1 3rd lap

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_4.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1 4th lap

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_5.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1 5th lap

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_6.Wiki: Special effect when stepping on the hit material 1 6th lap

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_7.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1 7th lap

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_8.Wiki: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1 8th lap

replaceMateiralId_Rain.Wiki: Hit material change destination ID due to weather (rain) (-1: No change)
